snippet: In Florida, a group of independent voters were active participants in their own secondary debate, providing as many questions as the on-air audience and as many answers as the candidates.
abstract: Group of highly-informed independent voters, led by the leader of the local Independent Party,  gathers in Largo, Fla, to watch and discuss the second presidential debate; group expresses concern that both Pres Obama and Mitt Romney evaded substantial answers to many questions, but feels that overall Obama's performance was better than that of his challenger.
lead_paragraph: In Florida, a group of independent voters were active participants in their own secondary debate, providing as many questions as the on-air audience and as many answers as the candidates.

headline.main: Party of Independents Analyzes and Criticizes
headline.print_headline: Party of Independents Analyzes and Criticizes
